img_above_text:
* The Great Sage's Broken Shell
## Water Curtain Cave
img_below_text:
At the start of Water Curtain Cave, go up the slope and to the cliff's edge. Run and jump across the gap to reach the path slightly below and be able to get behind the waterfall.
![Water Curtain Cave Walkthrough \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Water_Curtain_Cave_Walkthrough_%283%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a scenic area in the Water Curtain Cave, featuring a large waterfall surrounded by lush greenery and rocky cliffs. A red arrow is overlaid, pointing toward a path near the base of the waterfall, indicating the direction the player should take to progress in the game. This visual serves as a guide for navigating the terrain and reaching the path behind the waterfall, as described in the accompanying walkthrough text.
